topic.title: Hotel
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Hotel App on Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX.

ul.li:
Optimized the mechanism of applying configuration changes to improve the system stability.
You don't need to click Apply button to reload Asterisk if you save unchanged configurations.
If no Apply button appears after you save some specific configuration changes, then the configurations can be saved without reloading Asterisk.
Fixed the extension issue of room: the extension was wrong after adding a room.
Updated Russian and Italian web interface.
Fixed the issue that the room extension could not be configured correctly when adding or editing a hotel room.
The billing rate can be rounded to 3 decimal places.
Added support for displaying the hotel customer's name as caller ID name ( Hotel Settings General Room Settings Use Room Name as Caller ID Name ).
Fixed the issue that the PBX didn't stop making wake-up calls even the wake-up call was answered by the hotel guest.

Added support for adding customized fields for customers.
The customized information of customers will be displayed on the billing report.
Added support for adding additional information on the billing report. ( Hotel Settings General Company Remark )
Fixed the issue that the new billing report could not be checked.
Optimized the response speed of web page.
Optimized wake-up calls: the system only keeps the wake-up calls which are created after the customers check in.
Fixed the issue that if the web language was Chinese, the information on Room List page might be incorrect.
Added support for German Web interface.
